text: this right here guys is the Paloma
mimosa for those of you who don't know
what a Paloma is we have something up
that on we have to put them on the
website I think okay so you go check out
how to make that but there's a twist on
that which we turn into a mimosa so
tequila come behind now with some lime
juice okay squeeze squeeze squeeze
squeeze squeeze come behind that with
some grapefruit juice mm-hmm okay a lot
of times you see sporty Nam squirt in
Palomas as well we add a little bit of
grenadine okay give us a nice little red
color shake shake shake shake shake
shake and you can pour it in the base
all right
you don't need to use the grenadine if
you don't want to okay because Palomas
usually like great food and everybody
adds a nice color to it and then we pour
champagne on top of that okay so it's
really up to you if you want granite in
or not and also to taste you know if you
like it sweeter with the grenadine then
go ahead if not then don't but guys we
have dozens and dozens of mimosas on
tipsy bartender dot-com we have a lot of
mimosas okay like all kind so if you
looking for something different not just
Sunday brunch or your Saturday brunch or
on lunch when you take a little break
from work like I used to hit us up we
got you covered we give you something
